name: Easy Watergate Salad
author: sandysue
summary: Easiest recipe on the planet and it tastes awesome. I love this at Easter, but it could great any time of the year.
ingredients: 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple in juice (such as Dole®), undrained
1 cup miniature marshmallows (such as Kraft® Jet-Puffed)
1 (3.4 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix (such as Jell-O®)
½ cup chopped pecans (such as Planters®)
1 ½ cups frozen whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed
directions: Mix pineapple, marshmallows, pudding mix, and pecans together in a bowl; fold in whipped topping
Refrigerate salad until chilled and thickened, about 1 hour
